page.title: 19THE OPENCAST SITE (TWO)
page.content: He moved from Barnsley to get the job. After the opencast site is finished they will regrass the area and return it to farmland,though it will be a number of years before it can be used for arable crops. The limited time that they can work is from seven in the morning to seven at night. People have complained and protested about the noise, pollution, and the ugly scenery of the opencast.The large waste tips dominate the landscape of the area.To overcome complaints assurances were given that everything was being done to cut down on the noise and dust. People have also protested about the opencast site not being put back to its natural beauty but it is promised that when mining is completed people will not be able to tell that the opencast had been there. This is not true for other areas.
